mapper.insert: INSERT INTO students(full_name, name_pronunciation, nickname, email, area, birth_date, gender, remark, is_deleted) VALUES (#{fullName}, #{namePronunciation}, #{nickname}, #{email}, #{area}, #{birthDate}, #{gender}, #{remark}, false)

INSERT INTO students_courses_status(attending_id, status_id, status_start_date, status_end_date, change_reason) VALUES (#{attendingId}, #{statusId}, #{statusStartDate}, #{statusEndDate}, #{changeReason})
mapper.update: UPDATE students SET full_name = #{fullName}, name_pronunciation = #{namePronunciation}, nickname = #{nickname}, email = #{email}, area = #{area}, birth_date = #{birthDate}, gender = #{gender}, remark = #{remark}, is_deleted = #{isDeleted} WHERE student_id = #{studentId}
UPDATE students_courses SET course_id = #{courseId} WHERE attending_id = #{attendingId}
